newsitem.title: USA: MSNBC reports to be carried on Bloomberg terminals.
newsitem.headline: MSNBC reports to be carried on Bloomberg terminals.

text.p: Bloomberg LP on Wednesday said MSNBC's Desktop Video service would provide financial and business stories through Bloomberg News Service terminals.
Financial details of the deal were not disclosed.

Under the agreement, Bloomberg will feature daily audio reports from MSNBC Desktop Video. In addition, Bloomberg's main newsroom will have access to MSNBC Desktop Video's two private subscriber cable networks, MSNBC Professional and MSNBC Private Financial Network.
MSNBC is a joint venture between General Electric Co and Microsoft Corp. Bloomberg LP is a privately held provider of financial information and news.
